p: Further, the phylogeographic reconstruction was performed using a generalized linear model (GLM) [ 3], as implemented in BEAST version 1.10.4 [ 39]. We used both geographic and effective distances as possible predictors, calculated as described above. Distances were log-transformed and standardized before the analysis. Bayes Factors were calculated to evaluate the inclusion of the predictors into the model, using a prior probability of 50% that no predictors are included.
